dct_title_s: Wassende graadt kaert vande GROOTE, ZUYD, ZEE. van Ilhas d'Ladrones, Tot Rio de la Plate
dct_description_sm: Reissued, 1686 and later with "Gedrucht Bÿ J:Robyn. met Previlegio".
Issued in his: Zee, Zea-atlas-aquatique, del mar. -- Amsterdam, 1683.

California as large island on second Sanson model, with coastal place names. "Straet Anian" to north. Nearly identical with Van Keulen's 1680 map entitled "Pascaert vande Zuyd Zee en een gedeelte van Brazil..." Same cartouche with minor changes made, America labelled "America Pars","Staten Landt" [New Zealand] to far southwest, and "Compagnies Landt" to far northwest.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
